SEARCH
Module app
Package app

Class GameInstance

java.lang.Object
app.GameInstance
public final class GameInstance extends Object

High-level manager for an instance of the running application.
Is valid throughout the entire application runtime and not destroyed until the application is killed.

  • Method Details

    • executeCommand

      private static boolean executeCommand(Scanner scanner, String command)

      Executes a command from the main menu.

      Parameters:
      scanner - Scanner object to inherit to other objects.
      command - Command to execute.
      Returns:
      True if the application should be killed, false otherwise.

    • resetGame

      private static void resetGame()

      Kills the current game instance.

    • run

      public static void run()

      Called at the beginning of the application runtime.
      Holds the game loop and manages the game state.

    • getPlayerCount

      private static int getPlayerCount(Scanner scanner)

      Prompts the user for a valid player count.

      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner to read the input from.
      Returns:
      The valid player count.

    • getPlayerNames

      private static String[] getPlayerNames(Scanner scanner, int playerCount)

      Gets and validates the name of all players. Will only return a valid amount of player names.

      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner to read the input from.
      playerCount - The number of players.
      Returns:
      An array of player names.

    • getActiveGameMode

      public static GameMode getActiveGameMode()

      Global getter for the active game mode. Must be valid throughout the entire application lifetime.

      Returns:
      The active game mode.
